glsa.title: PowerDNS: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in PowerDNS could allow a remote attacker to create a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: The PowerDNS nameserver is an authoritative-only nameserver which uses a flexible backend architecture.

description.p: A vulnerability has been found in PowerDNS which could cause a packet loop of DNS responses.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send specially crafted DNS response packets, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.
